sentence: The store’s manager plans to put the new merchandise on display _____ to promote the line of fall fashions.
The guidelines for the monthly publication are _____revised to adapt to the changing readers.
We would like to discuss this problem honestly and _____ at the next staff meeting.
The riskiest _____ of the development of new medications are the trials with human subjects.
_____ an ankle injury, the baseball player participated in the last game of the season.
_____ that the insulation has been replaced, the building is much more energy-efficient.
_____ seeking a position at Tulare Designs must submit a portfolio of previous work.
Mr. Ross, _____is repainting the interior of the lobby, was recommended by a friend of the building manager.
Mr. Sims needs a more _____ vehicle for commuting from his suburban home to his office downtown.
_____ the building has an excellent location and a modern interior, it is popular among visitors.
A private reception for gallery donors will be _____ on March 5, prior to the grand opening of the exhibit.
The green light on the side of the water purifier lights up _____ the filter needs to be replaced.
Two items in Ms. Burke’s order were out of stock, so her invoice was adjusted _____.
The soccer players usually practice on the main field at Waterbury Park, but they sometimes practice _____.
MyHealth Co. has produced a wide range of vitamin supplements for _____ two decades.
The vacant rooms on the inn’s second floor have _____ been cleaned.
A minor electrical malfunction was discovered by the pilot _____ before the plane took off.
Following Ms. Rivera’s _____ statement, the official awards ceremony for Plex Industries will commence.
The Master Gardeners Club had to _____ its monthly meeting because the community center’s conference room was double-booked.
Financial advisors report that older investors tend to be_____ than their younger counterparts.
The accountants were unable to produce a full report by the deadline but promised that _____ would give a summary of the important points.
The short story cannot be reprinted _____ explicit permission from the writer.
A wildlife expert is scheduled to give a talk on the _____ that the factory has had on the surrounding forest.
Because of _____fuel costs, some people are choosing to stay home for the summer vacation rather than drive to tourist sites.
